review: I was so pleased with this purchase. It was so easy to set up and it works great. Now I wish I could make the time to watch everything that it offers.
author: Charlotte Lammers

review: So simple to use the family loves it
author: Amazon Customer

review: Cheaper than the Apple TV and better. Kids love the games, wife loves the apps and that makes me a happy dad.
author: Scott Zimmerman

review: I've only had the stick fire three days.  I like it.  4 stars only because I haven't experienced all of its capabilities.
author: Russell Blase

review: Love it!!! My new source of entertainment.
author: Patrick
